description: Simple TIU Document based on example database.
name: TIU Document
configuration:
{ "hasContent": true, "hasSummary": false, "hasContentTemplate": true, "contentTemplate": "

${TITLE}

${DOCUMENT_DATE} - ${PHYSICIAN}

${DOCUMENT_TEXT}

", "description": "Simple TIU Document based on example database.", "titleField": "TITLE", "descriptionField": "DESCRIPTION", "query": "select document_date, title, physician, id, document_text, substring(document_text, 1, 100) as description from tiu_document\r\nwhere patient_id = ?", "name": "TIU Document", "dataQueryColumns": [ { "keyField": false, "sort": "DESC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "DOCUMENT_DATE", "exclude": false, "type": "TIMESTAMP", "displayName": "DOCUMENT_DATE" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "TITLE", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "TITLE" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "PHYSICIAN", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "PHYSICIAN" }, { "keyField": true, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": true, "columnName": "ID", "exclude": false, "type": "BIGINT", "displayName": "ID" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": true, "columnName": "DOCUMENT_TEXT", "exclude": true, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "DOCUMENT_TEXT" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "DESCRIPTION", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "DESCRIPTION" } ], "singleElementQuery": "select document_date, title, physician, id, document_text, substring(document_text, 1, 100) as description from tiu_document\r\nwhere id = ?" }
